# Read in the dataset

```{r}
# meta data
d <- read.csv("data/sample_data.csv")
d$Year <- paste0("Y", d$Year)
d$Block <- paste0("B", d$Block)
d$Rep <- paste0("R", d$Rep)

# ASV table
asv <- read.csv("data/ASV_table.csv")
```

In total, we have 575 samples, each of them with `dim(asv)` ASV.






```{r}
library("lme4")


dim(d)
hist(d$Shannon)
hist(log(d$ASV_counts))

## Model One:
fit <- lmer(data=d, Shannon ~ (1|Year) + (1|Month) + (1|Species) + (1|Rotation) + (1|Nitrogen) + (1|Fraction) + (1|Block) + (1|Rep))
df <- as.data.frame(VarCorr(fit))
df$p <- df$vcov/sum(df$vcov)*100


## Model Two:
fit <- lmer(data=d, log(ASV_counts+1) ~ (1|Year) + (1|Month) + (1|Species) + (1|Rotation) + (1|Nitrogen) + (1|Fraction) + (1|Block) + (1|Rep))
df <- as.data.frame(VarCorr(fit))
df$p <- df$vcov/sum(df$vcov)*100

## Model Three:
fit <- lmer(data=d, log10(ASV_counts+1) ~ Fraction + (1|Year) + (1|Month) + (1|Species) + (1|Rotation) + (1|Nitrogen)  + (1|Block) + (1|Rep))
df <- as.data.frame(VarCorr(fit))
df$p <- df$vcov/sum(df$vcov)*100

## Model Four:
fit <- lmer(data=d, log10(ASV_counts+1) ~ Fraction + Year + Month + Species + Rotation + Nitrogen  + (1|Block) + (1|Rep))
df <- as.data.frame(VarCorr(fit))
df$p <- df$vcov/sum(df$vcov)*100

```


### Seperate fractions

```{r}
soil <- subset(d, Fraction %in% "Bulk Soil") #192
endo <- subset(d, Fraction %in% "Endosphere") #191
rhizo <- subset(d, Fraction %in% "Rhizosphere") #192

fit <- lmer(data=rhizo, log10(ASV_counts+1) ~  (1|Year) + (1|Month) + (1|Species) + (1|Rotation) + (1|Nitrogen)  + (1|Block) + (1|Rep))
df <- as.data.frame(VarCorr(fit))
df$p <- df$vcov/sum(df$vcov)*100


ggplot(df[-8, ], aes(x=grp, y=p, fill=grp))+
geom_bar(stat="identity", color="black")+
#scale_fill_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9"))+
  theme_minimal()
```

# Simple visulation

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
# Interleaved histograms
ggplot(d, aes(x=Shannon, color=Fraction)) +
  geom_histogram(fill="white", position="dodge")+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9")) +
  theme(legend.position="top")
```



```{r}
# Interleaved histograms
ggplot(d, aes(x=log(d$ASV_counts), color=Fraction)) +
  geom_histogram(fill="white", position="dodge")+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9")) +
  theme(legend.position="top")
```
